questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a tyrannical Warlord of the Sea who manipulates strings. What is...?
This arc features a battle on an island with a giant tree, where Luffy and crew face off against a Warlord of the Sea and a corrupt king. What is...?
This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates entering a secretive country ruled by a powerful Shogun and an Emperor. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows them to manipulate gravity. What is...?
This ability allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will. What is...?
This power is used to harden the body and weapons, increasing their offensive and defensive capabilities. What is...?
This character, the former captain of the Heart Pirates, is known for his ability to grant eternal youth with the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
This character, introduced in the Dressrosa arc, possesses the power of the Hobby-Hobby Fruit and can turn people into toys. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his sand manipulation powers and role as a key antagonist in the Alabasta arc. Who is...?
